function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High population density increases the risk of contagious diseases spread in cities","Impact":"Higher concentration of COVID-19 and other infections in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Expand horizontally and create more open spaces in urban areas","Technologies":"Urban planning and architectural design","People":"Residents of densely populated cities","Owner":"Policymakers and urban planners"},{"Description":"Controversy surrounding the impact of higher density on social interactions and sustainability","Impact":"Uncertainty about the effects of higher density on social interactions and sustainability in urban areas","Mitigation":"Research to understand the effects of higher density and develop appropriate strategies","Technologies":"Research and data analysis","People":"Residents of urban areas, policymakers, researchers","Owner":"Researchers and policymakers"}]}
